Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- Vacant land site
- Prime frontage to Gold Coast Highway, Mermaid Beach
- Build your own premises
- Building approval for 550sqm* of lettable area
- Land area 824sqm*

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Walk to a vast array of quality amenity

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE, in conjunction with Colliers, is pleased to offer for sale this significant waterfront development site within one of the Gold Coastâ€™s most sought-after locations.

The property is located in Mermaid Beach but firmly part of the Broadbeach story, this block sits prominently at the entrance to the iconic Pacific Fair Shopping Centre. 

The site comprises a total land area of 11,342sqm* combining sixteen lots and featuring three street frontages. The site presents an unmatched opportunity to create a mixed-use lifestyle precinct incorporating residential, hotel, retail, waterfront dining and office.

This is a true masterplan opening within a connected, desirable, and thriving Gold Coast suburb. 

- Concept plan for retail, commercial, and 735 apartments (STCA)
- Substantial 1.13 ha* land holding 
- Genuine masterplan opportunity (STCA)
- Excellent view corridors to the beach 
- Situated at the entrance of Pacific Fair Shopping Centre 
- Walking distance to Broadbeach & The Star Casino 
- Three street frontages 

The property is for sale via Expressions of Interest closing at 4:00pm, Wednesday 1 September 2021. 

(* Approximate)

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ICONIC MERMAID BEACH MASTERPLAN DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- Mixed use beachside development site
- Land area of 3,783sqm*
- Massive Highway exposure with triple street frontage
- Walk to the beach, Pacific Fair, Broadbeach Mall, Casino, Convention Centre

For a comprehensive Information Memorandum please call Exclusive Agents:

CB Richard Ellis: Lachlan Harris | 0409 057 733 | lachlan.harris@cbre.com.au

McVay Real Estate: Will McVay | 0412 048 486 | will@mcvayre.com.au

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: DEVELOPMENT SITE OPPOSITE LIGHT RAIL STATION

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- D.A approved for 32 apartments over 9 levels including open
     rooftop terrace

- Mix of 1, 2, and 3 bed apartments, retail shop plus entire first
     floor commercial office

- Short walk to Pacific Fair, Broadbeach, Casino, Light Rail and
     patrolled beaches.

- Freehold site currently improved by a motel

- Lack of new competing apartment stock in Mermaid Beach

- Ready to develop in early 2016

- Don't miss this opportunity to acquire one of this precincts key
  development sites.

CBRE are pleased to present an unrivalled opportunity to acquire 51 Peerless Avenue, (also known as 2583 Gold Coast Highway) Mermaid Beach.

A Development Application has been approved by the City of Gold Coast. The prime address benefits from access to Hedges Avenue and the Gold Coast Highway. Access to public transport is excellent with the Light Rail and Bus Station close by and located only a short walk to the new and improved Pacific Fair.

The position on Peerless Avenue sees the proposed project to benefit from beach and waterway views, as well as overlooking north to the high rise lights of Broadbeach and Surfers Paradise.

Please contact the exclusive marketing agent on the links above for a detailed Information Memorandum.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Mermaid Beach Mixed Use Development Site - SOLD
